ScraperAI is an open-source, AI-powered tool that simplifies web scraping by automatically detecting page types, extracting data, and generating reusable scraping configurations. It leverages LLMs like ChatGPT and supports custom crawlers and Selenium for robust web data extraction.

Local Lens is a privacy-focused desktop application that uses AI to organize and categorize personal photos locally on your computer. It offers features like face recognition, date grouping, and location sorting without uploading any data to the cloud, ensuring user privacy and data security.

macOS-use is a Python library that enables AI agents to interact with and control any application on macOS. It allows users to instruct their MacBook through natural language commands, which the AI then translates into actions within various apps.

Deta Surf is a personal AI notebook designed to streamline research and thinking by integrating files, webpages, and other digital content. It allows users to organize information into notebooks, generate notes, perform web searches, and even create interactive applications (Surflets) powered by user-selected AI models, all while prioritizing local data storage and open formats.
